definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The emperor abdicated in favor of his son.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝自愿退位，由他的儿子登基。

sentences.english: Japan'semperor wants to retire. Is he allowed to?
sentences.chinese: 日本天皇想要退位，他是否有权这样做？

sentences.english: The President signed the instrument of abdication.
sentences.chinese: 总统签署了退位的文告。
国王爱德华八世于1936年退位与一个平民结婚。

sentences.english: The king was unthroned at last.
sentences.chinese: 这位国王终于被迫退位。

sentences.english: King Edward Ⅷ of England abdicated the throne in 1936.
sentences.chinese: 英王爱德华八世于1936年退位。

sentences.english: A people which accepts a charter abdicates .
sentences.chinese: 人民接受宪章便是退位。

sentences.english: Lee Kuan -yew contemplates retiring with a hand on the helm .
sentences.chinese: 李光耀打算退位而依然听政。

sentences.english: He was castrated, then the emperor abdicated.
sentences.chinese: 他被阉，紧接着皇帝退位。

sentences.english: 1814 - Napoleon abdicates for the first time.
What song did Edward VIII sing when abdicating the throne of England to marry Mrs Simpson?
sentences.chinese: 爱德华八世退位与辛普森夫人结婚时唱的是什么歌？

sentences.english: In 1948, Queen Wilhelmina abdicated the Dutch throne for health reasons.
sentences.chinese: 1948年，荷兰威廉敏娜女王因健康问题退位。

sentences.english: Because of breach of the villagers, the incense are willing to be punished stepped back.
sentences.chinese: 因失信村民，金香甘愿受罚退位让贤。

sentences.english: In fact, she played no part in the Abdication.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，她与退位事件一点儿关系没有。

sentences.english: If the Queen abdicates, Prince Charles will become King of England.
sentences.chinese: 如果女王退位，查尔斯王子就会成为英国国王。

definition: Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)
